publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4283 Irene Oldfather: Protecting Community Staff from Second-Hand Smoke—That the Parliament notes the launch of the Royal College of Nursing’s best practice guide for healthcare staff and managers on protecting community staff from exposure to second-hand smoke; welcomes the guidance as a valuable source of practical advice and information for community nurses and other healthcare workers who have to visit patients in their homes; believes that all healthcare workers and other workers entering people’s homes have the right to work in a safe environment, and therefore encourages service users to take account of the needs of healthcare workers and others by enabling them to work in a smoke-free environment for the duration of their visit to offer support and assistance in the home.
